name: Vertigo (itch) (ShinyTseul) (ShinyTseul)
description:
It's a nightmare and poor Sara can't wake up! It's hard to tell which way is up in this challenging platformer.

This game was made for the first Lospec Jam (https://itch.io/jam/lospec-jam-1), though I finished it late, which is why you won't find it there. It was made for the imaginary console, the "LTRO-1."

Also, I want to keep track of best times. If you want to compete, send me a video of your completion. Current best time: 2:09.20 (ShinyTseul)

Controls (Supports Controllers)

Up, Down, Left, Right - Move

Space - Jump

Esc - Pause

Made by: ShinyTseul (me), NegaFruit (original level design concept), SunnyNonna (cover art), BlueTanda (music).

If you enjoy it, please let me know! If there's enough interest in the game, I can develop it further.
